text: HKM Sala is a Slovakian handball team located in Šaľa. Their home matches are played at the Mestská športová Hall. They compete in Extraliga. ==Accomplishments== *Extraliga: **Second place (1) : 2017 **Third place (1) : 2016 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round !
